column4: When I type "\wine start utorrent.exe from a remote location on my file server, a bunch of errors pop up saying that the X-Window manager could not be used or something, and then when I run top on the same SSH connection, it gives me utorrent.exe and about 5 or 6 utorrent.exe<defunct> processes. Any ideas why this may be?
Because I'm not cool enough to learn how to use rtorrent :\
there are many torrent clients available in ubuntu itself, you can use those.
